tool_description: Validates that certificate key usage and extended key usage extensions are appropriate for the intended cryptographic operations and certificate purposes.

certificate.description: Certificate to validate key usage for

intended_usage.description: List of intended key usages to validate against

strict_validation.description: Whether to apply strict key usage validation rules

error_messages: Invalid certificate: Certificate data cannot be parsed or contains no key usage extensions.
Key usage mismatch: Certificate key usage does not permit intended operations.
Invalid intended usage: One or more intended usage values are not recognized.
Missing key usage extension: Certificate lacks required key usage extension for validation.
Extended key usage conflict: Extended key usage conflicts with basic key usage.
usage: Provide certificate and intended_usage array with operations you want to validate. Set strict_validation for enforcement level. Returns usage compatibility results.

usage_valid.description: Whether certificate supports all intended usages

supported_usages.description: Key usages supported by the certificate

unsupported_usages.description: Requested usages not supported by certificate

key_usage_flags.description: Key usage flags present in certificate

extended_key_usage.description: Extended key usage OIDs present in certificate
